Utilising the orb of [[Amaterasu|black flames]] in his [[Susanoo]]'s third hand, the user is able to rapidly [[Kagutsuchi|produce]] a number of [[tomoe|magatama]] projectiles, which are composed entirely of the flames. Upon impact, victims are forcefully thrown off of their feet and quickly incinerated.

== Trivia ==
* Though unnamed in the manga and anime, this technique is named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]''.
